bug.description:
Hello, I am trying to use your code that crops the image for scanned photos. But here is what I get for output (knowing that the original image is a classic image with normal colors). <denchmark-link:https://i.imgur.com/8r1WWh6.png>https://i.imgur.com/8r1WWh6.png</denchmark-link>
Have you an idea of what is the problem? Thank you and have a great day.

comments.comment: Can you share what code exactly produces this image (load and output function)? And what version of OpenCV do you have? It might be strange, but OpenCV uses BGR as a default format for images.
